subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=bá
|c=bat6,but6
|h=pfs=pak
|md=buăk/băk
|md_note=buăk - vernacular (“to fall; to toss”); băk - literary (“to trek; postscript”)
|mn=poa̍h/poa̍t
|mn_note=poa̍h - vernacular (“to fall; to toss; to gamble; to turn around”); poa̍t - literary
|mn-t=buah8/buag8/buêg8
|mn-t_note=buah8 - vernacular (“to fall; to toss; to gamble”); buag8/buêg8 - literary (“to trek; postscript”)
|w=5beq
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v,n,pn
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} {{lb|zh|Min}} to [[fall]]
#: {{zh-x|跋著[着]|to fall down|MN-T|tr='''buah8''' dioh8}}
# {{lb|zh|Min}} to [[toss]]; to [[throw]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[gamble]]
# {{lb|zh|Hokkien}} to [[use]] (a scheme, trick, etc.)
# {{†}} to [[trample]]; to [[step]]; to step [[on]]
# to [[trek]]; to [[walk]]; to [[go]] [[by foot]]; to [[travel]] on [[land]]
# {{lb|zh|Hakka}} to [[get up]]
# {{lb|zh|Hakka}} to [[climb]]
# {{†}} {{lb|zh|Zhangzhou|_|Min Nan|Wu}} to [[turn around]]
# {{†}} [[base]] of a [[candle]]
# [[postscript]]; [[epilogue]]; [[colophon]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
